# Prerequisites

## Installation
1. Download and install R and Rstudio (UU: R Suite via Software center)
2. Download and install Quarto
3. Download and install git
4. Create a GitHub account

## Preparation

1. Watch the video about GitHub: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qXfbnz2id8A
2. Do the markdown tutorial: https://www.markdowntutorial.com/
3. Look through the slides from last time: https://github.com/nehamoopen/lets-git-started/blob/main/20240125_GitHub_for_EducationSupport_UB.pdf
